alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:46PM EDT until May 09 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Greenville Downtown, or near Welcome, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Welcome, Powdersville, Piedmont, West Pelzer, Donaldson Center, Mauldin, Greenville Downtown and Fork Shoals. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
